newsitem.title: MEXICO: RESEARCH ALERT-CIE downgraded to neutral.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-CIE downgraded to neutral.

text.p: The Banacci brokerage said on Monday it had downgraded entertainment firm Corporacisn Interamericana de Entretenimiento (CIE) to neutral from buy.
-- Analysts Arturo Vazquez and Rafael Urquma wrote in a research report said the share was approaching their year-end 1998 target price of 52.00 pesos.

-- The analysts said the share had strongly outperformed the Mexican bourse since their previous recommendation, and the expected price appreciation for the coming 16 months was "not very attractive."
-- CIE B shares were off 1.35 pesos to 41.50 in midday dealing on the bourse.
